- If encountering a `DirectoryNotFoundException`, note that disabling StaticWebAssets props generation, enabling long paths, deleting obj/bin, and using subst drive mapping have been attempted without resolution. Avoid redundant suggestions and consider alternative troubleshooting steps that are non-invasive and preserve file names. Dislike for repeated redundant suggestions should be taken into account when providing assistance.
